name: NETWORK, a cerebral Doom ][ Deathmatch
description: The newest DOOM level from the Bentworld group. Suitable only for Deathmatch hunts between 2 players. We STRONGLY recommend -altdeath -deathmatch -respawn. A long BULLDOG style corridor. The end rooms are stacked with just enough respawning items. A cross corridor with pits becomes the confrontation zone. Very playable. No Exit.
